{{Infobox/Jutsu |ref=''Boruto'' Volume 1, Mitsuki Character Profile |image=Wind Release Breakthrough.png;As a gust. Mitsuki's Wind Release.png;As a whirlwind. |kanji=風遁・突破 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Fūton: Toppa |english tv=Wind Style: Immense Breakthrough
Wind Style: Breakthrough |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu |jutsu type=Wind Release |jutsu class type=Offensive, Supplementary |jutsu range=Short, Mid |users=Boruto Uzumaki~manga, Gaara, Kokage Yanagikage, Mitsuki, Orochimaru, Bandō~anime |hand signs=Dog, Horse, Bird |debut manga=19 |boruto=Yes |sasuke retsuden=No |konoha shinden=No |blue vortex=No |debut anime=5 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=Yes |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game }} After gathering chakra in their stomach, the user expels it as a gust of wind. They can also release it as a burst of wind from their hands.''Boruto'' chapter 19, page 20 This technique is powerful enough to blow away everything within the user's immediate vicinity. This technique can also be used for supplementary purposes, such as creating a vortex of wind to save a falling ally. == See Also == * [[Wind Release: Passing Typhoon]] == References == [[fr:Fûton - Percée]] [[id:Fūton: Toppa]] [[pl:Fūton: Toppa]] [[ru:Стихия Ветра: Порыв]]
